long_description: Designed for cyclists who can touch their toes, the 225g Fizik Arione K:ium Bike Saddle offers podium-level performance and a full-length central channel to offer relief for sensitive tissues. Arione K:ium is designed to offer support for those with good flexibility-when bent forward fully, one's hands can easily touch toes. Synthetic Microtex cover is durable, water resistant and washable, and will not fade; plus, it's lighter than leather. Central channel spans the length of the saddle to offer a relief zone for sensitive tissues. Nylon/carbon-reinforced shell provides lightweight support and comfort. K:ium alloy rails offer an excellent strength-to-weight ratio and comfort-enhancing vibration damping.
short_description: Designed for cyclists who can touch their toes, the 225g Fizik Arione K:ium Bike Saddle offers podium-level performance and a full-length central channel to offer relief for sensitive tissues.
